title: BRIEF-Air Canada advises customers of cancellations and delays due to windstorm affecting Toronto-Pearson
text:
May 5, 2018 / 1:48 AM / Updated 10 hours ago BRIEF-Air Canada advises customers of cancellations and delays due to windstorm affecting Toronto-Pearson Reuters Staff
May 4 (Reuters) - Air Canada:
* AIR CANADA ADVISES CUSTOMERS OF CANCELLATIONS AND DELAYS DUE TO THE WINDSTORM AFFECTING TORONTO-PEARSON
* AIR CANADA- WIND,THUNDER STORM AT TORONTO-PEARSON HAS AFFECTED AIRPORT OPERATIONS, A NUMBER OF FLIGHTS AT AIRLINEâ€™S SYSTEM HAVE CANCELLED OR DIVERTED
* AIR CANADA - DUE TO AIRPORT FACILITY CONSTRAINTS & AIR TRAFFIC CONTROL RESTRICTIONS IT WILL NOT BE POSSIBLE TO OPERATE NORMAL SCHEDULE FOR REST OF DAY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
